nodes.text: Study of the Galactic Balance of Power: The New Order's Greatest Challenges

Study of the Galactic Balance of Power: The New Order's Greatest Challenges was a publication written by Kaelldin Krothburt and published by DataLine Press. It was restricted to government access. It was about the challenges faced by the Imperial Navy in the face of the growing combat experience of the Alliance to Restore the Republic as well as pirates.
